Name: Ressifice
About the game: Reasons why you shouldn’t camp at Sackwill Short answer is because its haunted but if you want to hear the real story of sackwill, Take a seat. One day, Satan came to Sackwill, i know you have questions but never judge the darkest and deepest pit’s Lord’s travel plan. While he was having fun ( and that meant a teeny tiny apocalypse for the people of Sackwill), six pilgrims showed up with righteous Lord's holy power in their heart. And the Satan wasn't very happy about. After many centuries, Satan returned to Sackwill for revenge with his new name and it is called 'Ressifice' if I recall correctly... At least this is what we know... Side-Scrolling Hack & Slash Puzzle Ressifice will give you a B-movie experience as a game. Puzzle features will entertain you while you solve the mysteries about Sackwill. In the meantime your enemies will always challenge you to die.
